documentation.title: Array Indent
documentation.standard: The opening brace of a multi-line array must be indented at least to the same level as the start of the statement.

code.title: Valid: Opening brace of a multi-line array indented at least to the same level as the start of the statement.
Invalid: Opening brace of a multi-line array not indented at least to the same level as the start of the statement.

documentation.standard: The first line of each array element must be indented exactly four spaces more than the start of the statement.

code.title: Valid: First line of each array element indented exactly four spaces more than the start of the statement.
Invalid: First line of each array element not indented exactly four spaces more than the start of the statement.

documentation.standard: There must be a newline before the array closing brace.

code.title: Valid: Newline before the array closing brace.
Invalid: No newline before the array closing brace.

documentation.standard: The closing brace must be on the same level of indentation as the start of the statement containing the array opener.

code.title: Valid: Closing brace on the same level of indentation as the start of the statement containing the array opener.
Invalid: Closing brace not on the same level of indentation as the start of the statement containing the array opener.
